pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Department of Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Consists of manuscripts, teaching, research and personal materials, theater programs, memorabilia, correspondence, clippings, photocopies, photographs, reel-to-reel tape recordings, including some of his productions for KPFK, n.d., magazines, posters and ephemera. Online finding aid does not include details of the KPFK productions.
